members.name: isAvailable
members.description: You need an iPhone 6S or some future tech to use the features of this plugin, so you can check at runtime if the user's device is supported.

members.name: watchForceTouches
members.description: You can get a notification when the user force touches the webview. The plugin defines a Force Touch when at least 75% of the maximum force is applied to the screen. Your app will receive the x and y coordinates, so you have to figure out which UI element was touched.

members.name: configureQuickActions
members.description: setup the 3D-touch actions, takes an array of objects with the following

params.name: type
params.description: (optional) A type that can be used `onHomeIconPressed` callback

params.name: subtitle
params.description: (optional) A short description for your action

params.name: iconType
params.description: (optional) Choose between Prohibit, Contact, Home, MarkLocation, Favorite, Love, Cloud, Invitation, Confirmation, Mail, Message, Date, Time, CapturePhoto, CaptureVideo, Task, TaskCompleted, Alarm, Bookmark, Shuffle, Audio, Update

params.name: iconTemplate
params.description: (optional) Can be used to provide your own icon

members.name: onHomeIconPressed
members.description: When a home icon is pressed, your app launches and this JS callback is invoked.

members.name: enableLinkPreview
members.description: Enable Link Preview.UIWebView and WKWebView (the webviews powering Cordova apps) don't allow the fancy new link preview feature of iOS9.

members.name: disableLinkPreview
members.description: Disabled the link preview feature, if enabled.
